name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, freshmen of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts posted big-character posters at the entrance of male and female dormitories, criticizing the teaching system of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts. The article stated that the Academy of Fine Arts requires freshmen of all disciplines to undergo a one-year realistic painting training. This type of course has no connection with their future majors at all, and is just similar to the painting training during the art examination.
This practice has seriously ignored the objective reality and the current development of art history. It is a simple, crude and seriously backward teaching concept. This education model has seriously affected the students' academic level and creative ability.
Afterwards, the school tore down the big-character posters.
The next day, the students drew three boxes on the torn wall and wrote "There used to be 3 A4 papers here."
After that, the school used spray paint to cover the text.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of December 30, Hu Xitui once again posted a message saying that those who engage in formalism, do not take responsibility and do not do anything to solve practical problems are destined to become increasingly unpopular. "Only those who are capable can get a position."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Notice of appraisal opinion issued by Nanning City Police

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @WSXJPDD A shares are the best pink behavior correction center in China

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: New Year's Day 2024 is approaching, and many places across the country have recently issued notices not to organize New Year's Eve activities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 28, in Foshan, Guangdong, a plastics factory issued a notice that in order to celebrate the Spring Festival, the workshop will be closed from December 28 and will officially return to work on March 1, 2024.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 29, students from Nanning No. 14 Middle School protested at school, demanding "three days off on New Year's Day" because they were dissatisfied with the school's one-day holiday on New Year's Day.
On that day, students wrote slogans such as "Long live freedom" and "What's the crime of fighting for freedom" on the bulletin board, and shouted loudly in the evening of the same day.
Under the students' efforts, the school compromised and changed the holiday to two days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Video of students shouting that night

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to multiple reports, school leaders accused students of behaving like the "Hong Kong riots".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Summary of the video of the night's shouting

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 30, a man was on a train in the early morning when he learned that his 22-year-old son, who had just returned home from military service, had died in a traffic accident. He collapsed instantly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 28, people in Ningling County, Shangqiu, Henan Province, marched with national flags in their hands

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 28, Ningling County, Shangqiu, Henan
The grandmother of the deceased showed the police officers under martial law photos of her grandson's tragic death one by one and patted their chests.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 28, in Ningling County, Shangqiu, Henan, a man gave a speech at the scene. They should give us an explanation and find out the facts. We should also publicize the government. They are making decisions for the people. If they can't handle it well, we can publish it later. They are here to maintain order and take care of the people. We took pictures of them. They don't let us publish it now, but we will publish it later. We all have children, and these people also have children, and they have to go to school. They can't stop us forever.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 28, Ningling County, Shangqiu, Henan Province
On that day, protesters and police officers had a violent scuffle
During the incident, many people were arrested. People surrounded the police car and demanded that they be released. Then, another person was arrested.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 28, Ningling County, Shangqiu, Henan Province
Faced with the crowd of protesters, the police retreated again and again. At this time, a man in white suddenly shouted "Stop" and rushed towards the police alone
Then the people shouted "Beat! Beat!" and rushed forward

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 28, protesters in Ningling County, Shangqiu, Henan, shouted "Yuhuayuan get out of school" and rushed into the county government building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Buildings in the video

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 28, in Ningling County, Shangqiu, Henan Province, a family member had earlier knelt down and begged a teacher, which then turned into a conflict, with angry people tearing off the teacher's mask.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 28, in Ningling County, Shangqiu, Henan Province, angry people pushed down the school fence, rushed into the school, grabbed a principal, beat him and asked him to kneel down. While being escorted to the school gate, he tried to explain, but the people did not give him a chance to explain. People kept shouting "Don't let him run away, catch him" Some sources said that the principal was actually a high school principal who was very good to students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 29, Ningling County, Shangqiu, Henan
The whole county was under martial law that day, but a large number of people still took to the streets, but were blocked outside the school due to the early road closure.
The photographer lamented that "there are more police than people"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 29, Ningling County, Shangqiu, Henan Province

Scenes of a confrontation between the public and the police

The police, holding pepper spray, shouted at the public: Unrelated people, please evacuate immediately, this matter has nothing to do with you, and if you continue to cause trouble and disrupt the procedure, you will be dealt with according to the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 30, Qingdao
Just now, a fire broke out in Qingdao Huangdao Free Trade Zone

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the scene, flames shot up into the sky

content: Police report

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 30, at the Guangzhou Storm Electronic Music Festival, the police started limiting the number of people who were present, presumably because there were too many people present, which led to a violent conflict between the police and the audience who had not yet entered the venue. The police on the scene put up a banner that read "Your behavior is suspected of being illegal, stop immediately."
